blogs.Name: Concept of Economy Analysis
blogs.Para1: The most important step in fundamental analysis is evaluation of the general economy.Economy analysis give overall conditons about company & industries.
blogs.Text2: when economy expands most of the industries grow and make more profit.But when the economy contracts most of the industries suffer to make profit and grow their business.
blogs.Para2: according to above you need to invest during economy expansion and divest during economy contraction.
blogs.Text3: The most important factors in Economy Analysis
blogs.Para4:
Market Indicators:
		1.Gross Domestic Product (GDP)
		2.Inflation rate
		3.unemployment rate
		4.interest rates
		5. consumer spending, and business investment.
blogs.Text5:
Government Policies:
1.Monetary policy (set by central banks)
2.fiscal policy (set by governments)
blogs.Text7:
Global Factors
1.International trade
2.foreign direct investment
3.global events
